content.prompt: Which of the following best explains why the printing press was a significant factor in spreading Protestant ideas?

choices.label: It was initially developed in a region of Germany that later became divided between Catholics and Protestants.
It was initially used to create books that were designed to replicate the appearance of handwritten works.
It enabled the reproduction of images as well as text.
It greatly decreased the cost and increased the quantity of written materials.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
